The Tinybook needs little introduction. Is there any cuter way to show off your Pics than this ? The photo quality is Surprisingly great, and Tinybooks even Magnet together or to your fridge.
Each book has 24 photos and you get 3 books with each order.
If you choose Instagram photos, you\'ll get 3 of the Same book, choose 72 images for 3 Unique books.
Tinybooks measure only 1.7 inches x 1.5 inches (37mm x 44mm).
Please fill in your Shipping Address

Multi Photo Upload\nYou have chosen a multi photo design. Please click your desired image source above. As you add images from your sources above the number of photos below will be counted. When you are ready to make the product please click the customize product button.

Single Photo Upload\nYou have chosen an item that only needs one image to complete the design. Please select an image source above, log-in if necessary to your desired photo source, and then push the customize product button

This is an awesome question mark PopUp

Yesterda I asked for any details about this screen but unfortunately all I've got was "Details will be filled in later". Design is about the content and can't be done without informations.

Not: Enjoy this empty unnecessary screen then ;)

Let's get started and make a beautiful Canvas ! This page takes 2 simple steps then you automatically move to the next step and start customizing your Canvas!

1) Choose which Canvas shape you want to use! 

2) Choose your Canvas size. If you don\’t automatically see your Canvas size, simply place your finger over the images and swipe it to the left until you see the size Canvas of your choice.

Now you really get to customize your Canvas! Once you select your Canvas wrap color and Photo Layout/Design it will automatically move to the next step of customizing your Canvas!

1) Select your Canvas Wrap Color Style

2) Choose which Photo Layout/Design you would like on your canvas. Below each Layout/Design it lists how many photos are allotted in each Photo Layout.

This page allows you to select your pictures & art from ALL of your favorite sources!

- Upload images from your device, Instagram, Facebook, Picasa, Flickr, or Dropbox.

- You can select one image from each source OR multiple images from multiple sources.

- Too many awesome images and not sure which will the look best? Upload multiple images so you can play around with the options. For example, on a 2 Photo Grid, you can upload more than 2 photos if you want to preview how different images will look while you're designing your Canvas on the next page.

- Notice that the photo counter in the bottom right corner is keeping track for you! After you select the images you want to try on your Canvas, click the Green Button (Next) in the bottom right corner

Arrange your photos however you like. OR, if you want a head start, select the Auto Arrange option (Blue Button) and we will pre-populate the grid with the image you chose. You can always go back and change the order after!

The images you selected on the previous step appear at the bottom of the screen. PRESS your finger on the image you want to move, HOLD and DRAG the image into the grid location you want the image to appear in.

Need to CROP or EDIT the image? DOUBLE-TAP the image you want to edit to go to the pop-up screen. Pinch to crop. To edit, select the options on the bottom of the screen to rotate, flip, or apply effects.

After you have filled each spot on the grid, click the Green button (Buy It) in the top right corner to review and add the item to your shopping cart.
This feature is not available for this type of product

We would love to tell you when it is live.

Would you like to change your case - this will discard all of your changes?

You have an image that has a low resolution for the product and layout selected. The photo is X% below the recommended resolution of the product. The print quality will not be as detailed and sharp. Are you sure would you like to use it? All photos with icon (i) have a low resolution for the options selected.
Note: This warrning will not be shown again.
Note: If you choose yes, You will be requested to use the same image more than once in your design.

You have choosen to select a custom color.

 After you click OK, the next screen will be black. Place your finger on the screen and while keeping contact drag your finger to find your preferred color.

 To select the color, remove your finger from the screen, and it will select that color for you.

You have chosen an item that only needs one image to complete the design.

Please select an image source above, log-in if necessary and click on the photo you wish to select.

Once you see the check mark in the corner of the image, push the blue personalize it button below to customize your product.

When done, click that big blue button.

To select the color, remove your finger.

We guarantee that you will be happy with your order and will remake the item anytime there is an error. We\'re here for the long term, and reputation matters more than profits.

Your order Number is %1$s \nYou have ordered the following products

Our Mission is to foster creative individuality and bring on-demand printed products to people all over the world. We hope to surround people with their favorite memories and brands, to remind them of the better things in life, improving the world one creation at a time.

We have an unwavering commitment to quality and customer satisfaction. If you're not happy, we're not happy. That's why we go the extra mile to insure that we carry the highest quality products, printed by the best printers, at the best possible prices.

We have print facilities all over the world, so whether you're in the USA, India, or Laos, we can ship to you! Since inception, we've shipped to over 100 countries.

Support@print.io for support and friends

1. Browse through our selection of products and choose the item or items you would like to purchase. We carry the highest quality products, printed by the best printers, at the best possible prices.

2. Customize your item. Choose the size, shape, layout and product options you like best.

3. Upload your images, or designs. Import from your phone, Instagram, Facebook, Flickr, Picasa, or Dropbox.

4. Ship to any country in the world! Specify your location and choose shipping method. We've shipped to over 100 countries and counting.

5. Pay using PayPal or the credit card of your choice. Our custom credit card imaging system makes it easier than ever to pay! All of your credit card info is automatically entered with one simple photo.

6. Enjoy! We place the utmost importance on quality and customer satisfaction. We know you'll love the products! Enjoy.

Let's get this started and make an awesome Phone Case for your device! This page takes 2 simple steps then it will automatically take you to the next step!

1) Choose the device you want to make the case for. If you don't automatically see your Phone type, simply place your finger over the phones and swipe it to the left until you see the Phone of your choice.
2) Choose the Photo Layout you would like on your Phone Case, this all depends on how many pictures you want to use!

Lets make an Acrylic Block!

This page is easy, in on step, you get to pick your thickness of the block and size at the same time!

 You have two Thickness sizes to choose from: 3/4 inch or 1 inch thick.

The 3/4 Inch Thick Block comes in three sizes and the 1 Inch Thick Block comes in two sizes.

 After you select your thickness and size you will automatically be taken to the next step.

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color you want your Phone case to be and also the style.

1) You can select a case color from the available colors or you can click the box with the plus(+) button which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!
2) If you want to select your own color simply select the plus(+) button, place your finger on the screen, drag your finger to select the color of your liking, then let go & you will have selected your case color! If you want to change the color, simply repeat this step again.
3) Do you prefer Matte Finish or Gloss Finish for your case & pictures/art? Select Matte or Glossy and then it will automatically take you to the next step!

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However example: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look encase you change your mind while designing your Canvas Wrap on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Canvas Wrap, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

This page allows you to add, edit or delete a Shipping Address.

To add a shipping address:

1) Please select the (+ Add a Shipping Address) button in blue at the bottom of the page.

2) A new Address Form Page will appear. Please fill out all necessary fields. Once all the Address fields are filled out, please select the (Save Address) button.

3) If you missed a required field, a pop up in red text will alert you to what is missing and ask you to update before re-saving.

To select a shipping address you have either added or that is already listed on the screen:

1) Simply select the address you want to use and it will automatically take you to the Shipment Review Screen

Your work(s) of art is almost ready to go!

- The Shipment Review Page breaks down your order summary by item, cost(s), Shipping Method, Tax, Order Total, and the Estimated Arrival Date of your shipment(s).

- If you are ordering multiple products, this page separates the shipment by type of product, making it easy for you to edit or remove items if necessary… but we hope you love what you made and we know you will be happy with it!

- Once jeverything looks great in Shipment Review, please select the (Enter Payment Info) Blue button in the bottom right corner, which will then take you to the Payment Page.

Almost done! You're now in the Payment screen to purchase your one-of-akind design(s)! 

- First, select your correct Billing Country.

- Next, select payment method (PayPal or Card) and follow the steps on the next screens.

You are in this screen because you selected to pay with a card. Automatically enter your credit card information by taking a picture of the front of your card OR enter manually with your keypad. Once you have entered information into each field, simply touch the (Place Order) Blue Button.

print.io thanks you for your Order!
You will receive an email confirmation shortly with your order # which has a direct link to help you track the status of your artwork!


If you ever have any questions the Customer Service contact will also be in your email confirmation.
Please come back and visit us again soon, we will always be adding more products to print on!

Support@print.io for support and friends
On the next page, each photo you select will add 1 magnet to your order.\n\nYou can adjust quantity and remove them at any time before checkout.
Sides of images are wrapped\n around case (not displayed)
%1$s allows you to store very large photos. Some large photos will cause an error in the app if you do not have a strong 4g or Wifi connection.
Changing country will potentially change the price of items in shopping cart.

Your order did not properly connect and validate with our server. You might have an issue with your connection. Please check your internet connection and try again. If you can not validate, please contact our support at: 877.731.PICS
We are sorry, but for there currently no shipping options for %1$s for inputted location.
There was a problem downloading some of the details needed to build your product.\nOur Team has been notified, please try again!

Let's get started and make a beautiful Wood Print! 

This page takes 2 simple steps, then you automatically move to the next step and start customizing your Wood Print!

1) Choose which Wood Print shape you want to use!

2) Choose your Wood Print size. If you don't automatically see your Wood Print size, simply place your finger over the images and swipe it to the left until you see the Wood Print size of your choice.

Let's get started and make a beautiful Metal Print! 

This page takes 2 simple steps, then you automatically move to the next step and start customizing your Metal Print!

1) Choose which Metal Print shape you want to use!

2) Choose your Metal size. If you don't automatically see your size, simply place your finger over the images and swipe it to the left until you see the size of your choice.

Now you really get to customize your Wood Print!

Once you select your Photo/Layout Design it will automatically move to the next step of customizing your Wood Print!

Choose which Photo Layout/Design you would like on your Wood Print. Below each Layout/Design it lists how many photos are allotted in each Photo Layout.

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However example: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look encase you change your mind while designing your Acrylic Block on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Acrylic Block, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However example: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look encase you change your mind while designing your Wood Print on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Wood Print, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

Let's get this started and make a custom Woven Blanket!

This page takes two simple steps and then it will automatically take you to the next step!

1) Choose the size of your Woven Blanket

2) Choose the Photo Layout you would like on your Woven Blanket, this all depends on how many pictures you want to use!

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color and style of your Woven Blanket!

Once you select your Blanket color you will automatically be taken to the next step.

1) Select a Blanket color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your Blanket color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However example: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look encase you change your mind while designing your Woven Blanket on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Woven Blanket, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color and style of your Phone case.

1) Select a case color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your case color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

3) Do you prefer Matte Finish or Gloss Finish for your case & images? Glossy finish reflects light and gives it a shiny look. Matte finish has no shine. Make your selections then we automatically take you to the next step!

Let's get this started and make an awesome Tablet Case for your device! This page takes 2 simple steps then you automatically move to the next step and start customizing your case!

1) Choose your device. If you don\’t automatically see your Phone type, simply place your finger over the phones and swipe it to the left until you see the Tablet of your choice.

2) Choose the Photo Layout you would like on your Tablet Case, this all depends on how many pictures you want to use!

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the color and style of your Tablet case.

1) Select a case color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus (+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus (+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your case color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

3) Do you prefer Matte Finish or Gloss Finish for your case & images? Glossy finish reflects light and gives it a shiny look. Matte finish has no shine. Make your selections then we automatically take you to the next step!

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However example: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look encase you change your mind while designing your Tablet Case on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Tablet Case, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

Let's get you started on customizing your own Shower Curtain!

Step one is easy! Simply choose if you want to use 1 Photo or a collage Curtain that allows from 2 Photos up to 16 Photos!

Once you select your Curtain Layout, you will automatically be taken to the next step!

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However example: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look encase you change your mind while designing your Shower Curtain on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Shower Curtain, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

Now you really get to be creative! This page allows you to choose the Background/Border Color of your Shower Curtain!

Once you select your Curtain color you will automatically be taken to the next step.

1) Select a Curtain color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your Curtain color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

Now you really get to start customizing your Acrylic Block!

Simply choose the Photo Layout/Design that you want to use and it will automatically move to the next step of customizing your Acrylic Block!

Your Photo Layout/Design Options are: -1 Photo
-9 Photos (A collage with no border, all the photos are touching, but not overlapping.)
-9 Photos (A collage with a thin black border that separates each photo evenly.)
-13 Photos (A collage with a think black border that separates all the photos evenly and has 1 picture centered.)

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

For every photo you select it will start at a quantity of 1 count for a magnet. When you are taken to the next screen you can adjust the quantity of each photo or remove it if you decide you do not want it.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Metal Magnets, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

To Edit Any Photo:

-Simply double tap any photo to be taken to the edit photo Screen.
 -Simply pinch to zoom in on the photo, or slide the photo to capture exactly what you want on your magnet!
-All the directions you need will be on that page!

 Change Quantity:

-Select the + (plus button) if you want to increase the quantity of the photo for the magnet.
 -Select the - (negative symbol) if you want to decrease or remove the photo from your order.

Add More Photos:

 Simply select the Back (blue button) to go back to the Select Photos page to access all of your photos again.

Buy it!

 -Simply select the Buy It (green button) in the top right corner to be taken to the shopping cart, where you can re-edit, Add More Products or Check Out!

Add a Shipping Address

Please type in all of the information this page is requesting. Once all of the Shipping Address fields are filled out, please select the blue (Save Address) button.

If you missed a required field, a pop up in red text will alert you to what is missing and ask you to update before re-saving.

Make sure you use an accurate email address to ensure you will get updated information about your order!

Let's make a Beach Bag!

This first step gives you the option to choose from having one photo duplicated on both sides to a collage of 3 photos up to 36 photos duplicated on both sides.

Once you make your selection you will automatically be taken to the next page!

Let's customize pillows!

This first step is easy because you pick your type of pillow and size at the same time! Place your finger on the screen and slide it up to see more options.

Simply choose if you want your pillow to have a zipper or no zipper and the size.

Once you make your selection, you will automatically be taken to the next step!

This page takes 2 steps!

Step 2 wants you to choose what type of layout you want for the front side of your pillow! Choose from 1 photo up to a 16 photo collage.

To see more Templates, simply place your finger over the pillows and slide your finger to the left to see more options.

Step 3 wants you to either choose a solid background color, or again choose another template of your choice.

One you make your two decisions you will automatically be taken to the next page!

This page allows you to choose the color of your Throw Pillow!

Once you select your Pillow color you will automatically be taken to the next step.

1) Select a Pillow color from the available colors OR you can click the box with the plus(+) sign which allows you to get more creative and pick your own color!

2) If you pressed the plus(+) button to select your own color, HOLD your finger on the screen, DRAG your finger to select the perfect color, then LET GO & you will have selected your Pillow color! To change the color, simply repeat this step again.

Let's get started and make a beautiful Acrylic Print!

This page takes 2 simple steps, then you automatically move to the next step and start customizing your Acrylic Print!

1) Choose which shape you want to use!

2) Choose your size. If you don't automatically see your size, simply place your finger over the images and swipe it to the left until you see the size of your choice.

Step 3 is easy!

Simply decide how many photos or photo you want to have on your Acrylic Print!

Once you make your selection, you will automatically be taken to the next step!

Let's save memories on Thick Prints!

This first step you simply choose what size you want to print your photos on!

Once you make your selection, you will automatically be taken to the next step!

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Thick Prints, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

Let's get started and make a beautiful Framed Print!

This page takes 2 simple steps and then you automatically move to the next step and can continue to customize your Framed Print.

1) Choose your print type

2) Choose your Framed Print Size. If you don't automatically see your Frame Size, simply place your finger over the images and swipe it to the left until you see the size Frame of your choice.

One you make your selection in Step 3 and Step 4 you will automatically be taken to the next Customization Step.

Step 3: Choose Your Frame Color

Step 4: Choose which Photo Layout/Design you want. To see more options, simply place your finger over the Layouts and slide your finger towards the top of the phone to see more.

This page allows you to select your pictures and art from any or all of your favorite sources!

You can select one image from each source or multiple from each source.

However: If you have selected a 2 Photo Grid, when completing your design you will only be able to use 2 photos in the end design. However this allows you to see how different images look encase you change your mind while designing your Framed Print on the next page.

There is a photo counter in the bottom right corner that keeps track for you!

After you select the images you want to try on your Frame Print, select Next (Green Button) in the bottom right corner.

Step 1 is Easy!

Simply select which Size and Set you want to create!

Once you make your selection, you will automatically be taken to the next step!
